rules_text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and can't block or be blocked.
Whenever equipped creature would die, exile it instead and sacrifice Blade of a Shattered Realm.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if Blade of a Shattered Realm is in your graveyard, return that creature to the battlefield, then return Blade of a Shattered Realm from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
